page.title: 13SKIING NEAR GRANTOWN
page.content:
Grantown-on-Spey is a good centre for skiing as it lies between the two main skiing grounds in North East Scotland, Cairngorms and the Lecht. Both lie within 40km of the town.
The Lecht, on the road to Aberdeen, is well suited to the beginner and intermediate skier, having gentler and shorter runs. It is also quieter and cheaper than Cairngorm.
The Cairngorms is Britain's premier winter sports centre, with a complex of runs. Cross country skiing is also catered for. Both sites have cafe and toilet facilities.
Skis may be hired from Speyside Sports in Grantown, at the Lecht ski grounds, and in Aviemore and Carrbridge on the way to the Cairngorms.
